title: Conceptual MVT with solid of revolution part - d

content.question: Let R be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of f and line segment PQ. Write an integral expression for the volume of the solid generated by revolving the region R about the x-axis. Do not evaluate.

frqParts.text: Let R be the region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of f and line segment PQ. Write an integral expression for the volume of the solid generated by revolving the region R about the x-axis. Do not evaluate.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
